DOC.brief_summary: Mentor Integration Project This study investigate benefit CHESS , Human Cancer Mentor potential additional benefit combine CHESS Cancer Mentor compare Internet access woman diagnose breast cancer . Our goal advance interactive cancer communication system , thus improve quality life patient family face cancer , especially underserved population . Primary Aims : - Determine Internet , CHESS , Cancer Mentor , combination CHESS Cancer Mentor improve quality life woman breast cancer - Determine condition effective - Determine condition cost efficient
DOC.criteria: Eligibility protocol follow : All subject must within 2 month primary breast cancer diagnosis , All subject must least 18 year age , All subject must able read write English 6thgrade level Not homeless
